job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: stronguAbout UsbrbrustrongAt Carscom we help shoppers meet their perfect car match and people find their perfect career match As one of the top places to work in Chicago according to The Chicago Tribune BuiltIn Chicago and others we pride ourselves on a culture of growth and innovationbrbrCarscom has revolutionized the automotive industry for both shoppers and sellers through technology and solutions for buyers and sellers alike We never shy away from a challenge move fast collaborate across functions to approach problems from every angle Weve built a culture thats secondtonone and share core values that keep everyone working fullspeed at the same goals with the same open outcomedriven and bold attitudesbrbrCarscom is a CARS brand CARS includes the following brands Carscom Dealer Inspire DealerRater Learn more here brbrstronguAbout The RolebrbrustrongData is the driver for our future at CARS We are looking for a Data Scientist III to join our data science team This team is responsible to improve shopping experience optimize sales and marketing pipelines and build measurement strategies In simple terms this is the team behind all machine learning products at CARSbrbrData ScienceCars is a group of collaborative and humble individuals from diverse backgrounds We are actively involved in the open source community and regularly participate in Data Science events We learn from each other through regular algorithmiccode review sessions and stay connected through coffee chats in this remote worldbrbrstronguAbout The ProjectsbrbrustrongWe deliver scalable ML products that are served to millions of users through our website and mobile app Search Recommendation Systems Pricing and Churn are some of the example projects that we actively work on Right from the start each team member will own a products and as the time progresses you will gain exposure to working on diverse areas of ML The team maintains a healthy balance between research projects and immediate deliverablesbrbrstronguOn a Typical Week You Willbrustrongul li Collaborate with product and engineering teams to define design build and deploy machine learning models and frame AB tests li li Understand business impact of models and monitor model performances to make sure model outputs are of good quality at all times li li Apply robust and maintainable coding practices to ensure model outputs are provided reliably and efficiently at all times li li Work with business partners to identify business opportunities and trends li li Communicate modeling methodologies and analytical findings to business stakeholders li li Stay uptodate with latest technology trends and publish research articles on science and innovations li brbrulstronguRequirementsbrustrongul li 4 years professional experience in developing machine learning models with a BSMS in statistics econometrics machinelearning applied mathematics or related quantitative fields li li Understanding of supervised and unsupervised machine learning concepts li li Experience with entire pipeline of deploying machine learning algorithms including development validation implementation and production launch li li Strong coding skills in PythonPySpark and knowledge of OOP and functional programming li li Experience in writing efficient SQL or similar RDBMS queries li li Understanding of AWS ecosystem li li Good documentation skills li li Be flexible in working on diverse problems instead of focusing on a particular ML area like Image Recognition Natural Language Processing etc li li Understanding of coding best practices and familiar with version control tools li li Experience with presenting technical work to executives in a concise and effective way li brbrulstronguPreferredbrustrongul li Experience in delivering complex ML systems that use real time scoring li li Experience in mentoring other Data Scientists or data enthusiasts li li Involvement of any kind in data science community li li PhD in statistics econometrics machinelearning applied mathematics or related quantitative field li brulWe are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company We do not discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability statusbrbr
